## IChartWideInteractionOptions interface

These are set for the whole chart as opposed to per plot.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IChartWideInteractionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disableAllInteraction](./core.ichartwideinteractionoptions.disableallinteraction.md) | boolean | Default false |
|  [disableLongPressContext](./core.ichartwideinteractionoptions.disablelongpresscontext.md) | boolean | A contextmenu event will be emitted on long tap, prevent the default with this.<!-- -->Default true. |
|  [scrollZooms](./core.ichartwideinteractionoptions.scrollzooms.md) | boolean | Scroll wheel will scroll page by default, set true to prevent this and zoom instead.<!-- -->Default true. |
